archimate:Requirement.name: BA.2.3.9: Information contained in databases should be protected by restricting access to or removing standard menus (e.g. by hiding the standard menus or replacing standard menus with a customised menu to prevent access to developer functions).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
